concept.title: Discard
concept.shortdesc: The Discard function removes nodes from the central Graph or Shelf and sends them to the Discard bin.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: Nodes can be discarded either manually or using the Commands Tab.
Return discarded notes to the Shelf using the Retrieve function.
